lyrics:
39 contributorstranslationsava max  take you to hell 中文翻譯polskiespañoltake you to hell lyricschorus
if youre gonna treat me right
ill take you to heaven every night
but god forbid you leave me by myself
ill take you to hell take you to hell

verse 1
three golden rings he got on his hand
he likes to go to the south of france
i cant tell if this is romance
baby whats his plans

prechorus
i dont wanna be a diva so dramatic
but thats the price youre payin if you want my magic
not the kind of lover you can just get back with no no

chorus
if youre gonna treat me right
ill take you to heaven every night
but god forbid you leave me by myself
ill take you to hell take you to hell
if you plan on being mine
boy ill be your blessing shining knight
but god forbid you leave me by myself
ill take you to hell take you to hell take you to hell
you might also likeverse 2
heart of gold thats made of steel
im not a bite im a five course meal
you want the rest better sell your soul
nobody has to know
